divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up an was staring in the sky and saw a star like object flying through space very high, then a few seconds later a fireball appeared like it came out of the middle of the sky right above a large tree and shot downwards like a falling star behind the large tree. The ball was orange with red outline.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around January 17th 2009
